<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105178</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105178</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205271</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Immigration: A Vision & A Dream</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Immigration: Ein Anblick U. Ein Traum</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Immigration : Une Vision et Un Rêve</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Immigration: Uma Visão & Um Sonho</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Immigrazione: Una Visione & Un Sogno</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μετανάστευση: Ένα όραμα & ένα όνειρο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Inmigración: Una Visión Y Un Sueño</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">In this lesson, students will explore issues surrounding immigration, assimilation and maintenance of cultural identity.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <coverage>
            <string language="en">North America</string>
          </coverage>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In dieser Lektion erforschen Kursteilnehmer die 
Ausgaben, die Immigration, Assimilation und Wartung der kulturellen 
Identität umgeben.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans cette leçon, les étudiants exploreront des 
issues entourant l'immigration, l'assimilation et l'entretien de 
l'identité culturelle.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Nesta lição, os estudantes explorarão as 
edições que cercam o immigration, o assimilation e a manutenção da
identidade cultural.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In questa lezione, gli allievi esaminare le 
edizioni che circondano l'immigrazione, l'assimilazione ed il 
mantenimento dell'identità culturale.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε αυτό το μάθημα, οι σπουδαστές θα ερευνήσουν τα 
ζητήματα που περιβάλλουν τη μετανάστευση, την αφομοίωση και τη 
συντήρηση της πολιτιστικής ταυτότητας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En esta lección, los estudiantes explorarán las 
ediciones que rodean la inmigración, la asimilación y el 
mantenimiento de la identidad cultural.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205271</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>

VERSION:3.0

FN:OERCommons

          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105178</entry>
    </identifier>

      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>

    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/immigration-a-vision-a-dream</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
